ygData.subject: couple of questions for the group
ygData.msgSnippet: Just a couple of questions. 1.  Has anyone been able to find Lord Grimrot?  You get this quest to take a dwarf skull to him from the guild in Qeynos.  I ve
ygData.messageBody:
Just a couple of questions.

1. Has anyone been able to find Lord Grimrot? You get this quest to take a dwarf skull to him from the guild in Qeynos. I've heard he spawns if you kill all the skeletons in that spot south of the bridge in south karana, but there has to be an easier way.

2. Does anyone know for sure whether it helps to keep casting siphon strength on a single target? I get the message saying the target weakens every time I cast it, but I have heard it works only once.

-- Saron Darkrider of Karana
